ingredients.content: 1 organic lemon, (approx. 5 oz) thin peel only (no pith), plus juice (approx. 2 oz)
6 oz jumbo lump crab meat, white, brown or mixture
2 ½ oz arugula, plus extra to garnish

preparations.content: Place lemon peel, ¼ tsp salt and pepper into mixing bowl and zest <b>30 sec/speed 9<b>. Transfer into a bowl and set aside.
Place water, 1 tsp salt and 1 tsp oil into mixing bowl and bring to a boil <b>9 min/Varoma/speed 2<b>.
Add pasta and cook for <b>time indicated on package/212°F//speed 1<b>. Rinse pasta under cold running water, drain well using simmering basket and set aside. Clean mixing bowl.
Place garlic into mixing bowl and chop <b>5 sec/speed 5<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula.
Add shrimp and oil and sauté <b>2 min/212°F//speed 0.5<b>.
Add crème fraîche, crabmeat, arugula and reserved lemon zest and heat <b>3 min/195°F//speed 0.5<b>.
Add drained linguine and lemon juice and stir <b>2 min/175°F//speed <b>. To serve, sprinkle with toasted pine nuts and garnish with arugula.
